resources.string: Step 1: Go to your Android\'s settings, find the "Accounts" section, and click the "Add Account" button. Or just click here:
Step 3: Enter your Fastmail.fm account information.
Note: Changes made on Fastmail.fm will sync to your device, but not the other way around. Don\'t like it? Cry me a river.
App icon is based on Address Book designed by misirlou from the Noun Project.
Please enter your email and password.
Please wait while your credentials are checked.
Authentication failed. Check your email and password.
